name: Apartment Central Hanoi
address: 458 Minh Khai, P8-111, Park Hill Times City, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 2 km from Hanoi Creative City in Hanoi, this apartment features an outdoor pool. This apartment provides a year-round outdoor pool and free WiFi.

There is a seating area and a kitchen equipped with a microwave. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and game console, as well as an iPod docking station and a laptop are featured. Other facilities at Apartment Central Hanoi include a sauna and fitness centre.

National Museum of Vietnamese History is 3.4 km from Apartment Central Hanoi, while Hanoi Opera House is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 25 km from Apartment Central Hanoi.
